text: Net worth is the amount of all the non-financial or financial money owned by an institution or person.System of National Accounts 2008, published by the European Commission, the International Monetary Fund, the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development, the United Nations, and the World Bank, p. 49, section 3.109. Net worth can apply to companies, individuals, governments or economic sectors such as the sector of financial corporations or to entire countries. == References == Category:Money
title: Net worth
